It is such a sunny day! I feel like we're in a steam pot or something... I really need something to cool down!

Hi there! It has been very hot these days! We could make one of the most delicious coconut juices in Malaysia if only we had enough coconuts. With all those #b#o9420527#s#k running outside the village, we won't be able go out of the Kampung to get enough coconuts.
Will you help us get rid of them and collect #b50 #t4000465#s#k for us?
Hope you will return before any one of us passes out from this deadly heat...
C'mon now, you could enjoy nice cool coconut juice yourself. What do you say?
You have collected #b50 #t4000465#s#k! Thank goodness, we were dying from thirst here.
Now, we can drink some water with the #b#t4000465#s#k and cool down. What a refeshment!
